result.name: SOLR_SYSTEM_COMMITED_VIRTUAL_MEMORY_SIZE
result.displayName: System commited memory size reported by SOLR
result.description: Total commited memory on the system reported by SOLR service.

result.name: SOLR_SYSTEM_FREE_PHYSICAL_MEMORY_SIZE
result.displayName: System free memory reported by SOLR
result.description: Amount of free memory on the system reported by SOLR service.

result.name: SOLR_SYSTEM_PROCESS_CPU_TIME
result.displayName: System CPU time for for SOLR
result.description: CPU time on the system used by SOLR

result.name: SOLR_SYSTEM_OPEN_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_COUNT
result.description: Total amount of file descriptors open in the system.

result.name: SOLR_SYSTEM_MAX_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_COUNT
result.description: Total amount of allowed file descriptors in the system.

result.name: SOLR_JVM_UPTIME
result.description: Uptime of JVM used to serve the SOLR service.

result.name: SOLR_JVM_PROCESSORS
result.description: Number of processors used by SOLR.

result.name: SOLR_JVM_MEMORY_FREE
result.description: Amount of free memory in the JVM stack used by SOLR.

result.name: SOLR_JVM_MEMORY_TOTAL
result.description: The total amount of allocated JVM memory size.

result.name: SOLR_JVM_MEMORY_MAX
result.description: Total amount of JVM memory used by SOLR since the last startup.

result.name: SOLR_JVM_MEMORY_USED
result.description: Total amount of JVM memory currently in use.

result.name: SOLR_THREAD_CURRENT
result.description: Number of threads running to serv requests arriving to SOLR.

result.name: SOLR_THREAD_PEAK
result.description: The maximum number of threads in running state since the last startup.

result.name: SOLR_THREAD_DAEMON
result.description: The number of running threads used by the SOLR daemon.

result.name: SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_LOOKUPS
result.description: Total amount of lookups in the document cache.

result.name: SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_HITS
result.description: Total amount of document cache hits (Number of requests where the doc. cache was used).

result.name: SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_HITRATIO
result.displayName: Percent of hits in document cache
result.description: The percentage of hits in the document cache.

result.name: SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_INSERTS
result.description: Total amount of inserts in the document cache.

result.name: SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_SIZE
result.description: The size of the document cache.

result.name: SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_EVICTIONS
result.description: Total amount of evictions in the document cache.

result.name: SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_WARMUPTIME
result.displayName: Warmup time of the document cache
result.description: The time needed (seconds) to warm up the document cache.
